thread.title: Limpopo assessing wildfire damage

author: news24.com
title: Limpopo assessing wildfire damage
text:
Limpopo - Officials have been deployed to the fire ravaged Waterberg district to assess if the damage warrants a "disaster" status.
The blaze, which started on Friday, has killed a firefighter and damaged at least 80 000 hectares of farmland, mostly for game farming.
Mopping up operations were under way.
Provincial agriculture MEC Joy Matshoge said a team has been deployed to the area to assess the damage.
